item.title: Where would i post these command codes? please help i need asap
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

[quote=“Razik-Blaze, post:10, topic:352580”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=448923.msg3293658#msg3293658 date=1280792883]

[size=14pt]SORRY YOU PUT IT UNDERNEATH private void customCommand(String Command) {[/size]

underneath public void newObjects() {

Your answer is better i would have said under the master command cus thats what i always do.
[/quote]That’s a good strategy, but if you check, then the master command itself is also in the void

EDIT: not in newobjects lol, I got messed up. You put it underneath private void customCommand(String Command) {

why would i check it if it works… :P[/quote] he means that the master command is in the void

Read full topic

item.description:
@kickyamom50 wrote:

okay i was looking through the server and found these commands for drop parties…where do i put them?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("droprandom")&& playerRights >= 3){ ItemHandler.addItem(1038, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(2860, absX+1, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(4563, absX-1, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(3425, absX+1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(2353, absX-1, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1786, absX+1, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(1057, absX-1, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(5464, absX, absY+1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(8348, absX, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); ItemHandler.addItem(6644, absX, absY-1, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false); } else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dropdragon")&& playerRights >= 3){ ItemHandler.addItem(4732, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1], playerId, false);
